WorkItem.Description:
There is no Curse of Shadows or Imp Curse of Shadows in the moonkin module, one of the key factors in bringing a pure Starfire/MF rotation to the top.
There also are not rotations of Moonfire with 5,6,7,8 Starfires to scale with haste.
WorkItem.Summary: [Moonkin] No CoS in buffs or MF/SFx (5,6,7,8) rotations

Comments.Message: Thanks for the heads up about Curse of Shadows; I'll add that.  As for MF/SFx5/6/7/8, a new Starfire is automatically added to the cast rotation if you have sufficient haste, but the label is not updated.  I'll try to figure a way to do that.

I'm rather sure that the auto add spell to rotation code is not working properly,
The MF/SFx4 rotation caps out haste gains at 323, any haste past that gives no DPS, But it continues to give DPS to the SF Spam rotation.

The way I have it implemented is that if you have insufficient haste to add another spell to the rotation without either clipping a DoT tick or letting the DoT drop, it will not add the cast.  This is probably why you're not seeing any more increases in DPS on a DoT-bound rotation, whereas pure Starfire spam will give DPS increases because there is no DoT component.
